comments.title: Why buy eco device
comments.description: I am using pureit  eco device I share my personal opinion first all person chose some kind of ro filter try to check ur current borwel water tds level (total disolved solid) normal ro device like ro+uv any brand suitable tds range is below (2000 tds) range device waste water ratio 1:3  water after purify stage  level 35 to 150 tds its normal ro device working like that.some people said that I don't want taste drink water I want only rich Mineral water that person only buy this type eco device otherwise don't buy it try to normal ro+uv model any brand u want.eco device input borwel water tds level below 2000tds that output purifier water become 150 to 250 tds level this range not tasty water and output waste water ratio1:2 but good Mineral in the water who recommended range 50 to 150 very good drinking 150 to 250 good quality of water rich Mineral so now I tell u if u want only taste in water don't buy eco model device try normal ro+uv.

comments.title: Don't go by negative views
comments.description: This is an extremely good product. I received it on 6th of May and I called up Pureit and asked them to install on 8th May, Sunday as nobody is available during week days. I also told them that water is available only between 10 am to 12 am so they will have to send their technician between that time. They noted my requirements and informed me that the technician will be calling me before coming. I received a call from the technician on the same day and he confirmed that he will be coming on 8th May by 10-10:30 am. He came during the specified time, installed and checked the machine. He explained me the functionality also. But later, I found that there is a drop-by-drop leakage from the bottom. I again called the company and booked my complaint with the same Sunday conditions. The technician came on 15th May at 10 am and did the necessary and the leakage stopped. Later he told me that he is an engineer. He also told me that their plumber was on leave on the day of installation, so he came himself. Such a dedication that an engineer is coming himself for the installation. I haven't seen this anywhere. The company that is doing Pureit installations in Pune is Iqra Enterprises and the name of engineer who came is Yogesh Sakpal. Hats off to both. I have given 4 ratings currently just because it is new. Let me use it for a month or two, then I will come and edit my rating. But please don't go by negative reviews.

comments.title: Worst purchase ever - Don't waste your money
comments.description: writing this review after 11 months of use. This is the worst purchase I have made on Amazon. During installation, the technician will not wait to check the water quality. He will also force you to provide 5 star rating in front of him and when asked for the reason, he will tell you that this is company policy. When complained about this, the company representative will say that there is no such policy but no action will be taken and innocent customers will keep providing 5 star rating to this useless product under pressure. The RO broke down within 11 months and when technician visited on complaint, he told the membrane has to be replaced without even opening the RO at all (he must have some great powers that we don't know about). Even under warranty, they will charge full cost of repair to you. At this point, we gave up and will buy RO from another company. Writing this review so other people can save their money. I believe, most the 5 star rating on this product were given under pressure from the technician during installment. Hope this helps.

They started getting choked every other month and needed replacement.  No transparency in filter pricing. I guess replacement filters are of very poor quality or not authentic. Service by techniciansis also poor and untimely. Go for other time tested brands or good local manufacturers for peace of mind. You get 1 year warranty but electrical parts not covered. comments.title: Avoid buying this product as it requires 11000 annual maintainenace for resin replacement
comments.description: I bought this product exactly an year back. That time the sales head of Kent told that the resign will go 5-6 years minimum. However it started giving problems in 4-5 months. Exactly after 1 year 15 days, it stopped. When I raised the request (RE-354848), the dealer told to replace the 25kg resign which would cost 11000 rupees. When I called the sales head, he told that it would go minimum 3-4 year in all parts of bangalore. There was no support from customer care apart from a standard reply that we have escalated this matter. Then they said there is no warranty on resign.  After 1 month , they closed the request giving the reason that it is unserviceable.  This is a garbage product. While selling, they would call 100 times with false promises of 5-6 years of zero maintenance and then they close the request if you don't spend 11k every year.  This product cost 80000 rupees. So if you are buyign this, think twice. You will spend 80k for one year and then 10k every year.

comments.title: Third class...not recommended
comments.description: I bought this product from shop. After installation it was not working properly and getting time to store the tank. So I raised query, I have to installed extra filter outside and booster pump costing for the sme was around Rs. 5-6k. Even after installing booster the performance was not good. Meanwhile, candle expired due to continues use I.e. 100 hrs or 600 ltrs which is very less as compare to other products. I had raised 7-8 tickets, even that the  product is not good and not performing well. So I decided to bought other good water filter. I am strongly not recommending this product due to its performance and heavy manitance charges which is around Rs.4-5k

comments.title: Poor quality product and spares
comments.description: Pathetic product. Purchased it last year, every month there is some issue with this RO despite good water inlet ( TDS ~ l500, clean) and voltage. Issues - Frequent waste water stopages , motor running continuosly but not filling storage tank. Had to change GKK twice. Already spent  70% of the purchase cost in very first year. My uses are decent for a small family of 4 members. Worst part is, only electrical part is covered under warranty and they don't take any responsibility of poor quality GKK kit that they are supplying at exorbitant prices. Prior to this I was using Puriet ULTIMA, it ran good for 6 years. Seems overall quality of Puriet products and spares has gone down. Thinking to switch to another brand now.

comments.title: Not Worth
comments.description: Company claims 1 yrs warranty +3 yrs free service. This is all marketing tactics. Once 1 yr is completed when you call for free service, person will try to create mental fear factor about equipment parts & its cost and will insist to buy AMC which itself cost about Rs 7.5K - 8K. Its also not suitable where water is hard like that of underground water source. Such water will shorten life of equipment's spare parts & hence will not be pocket friendly. On every visit by service person, he will check TDS by his instrument & his readings will vary each time. So he will say that water quality is not good & hence will suggest to change parts frequently.

comments.title: Lot of recurring costs.
comments.description: The product itself is good enough for 200 TDS or below water. Though company claims 6000 litre of purification before the UF filter will stop working, but in reality it is way less. UF filter gave up in 8 months, we are family of 3 only so it should last around a year. Now cost of replacing the UF filter is around 700 (as informed by the authorised service person). They will insist on installing a booster pump as well which will cost you around 4200 if you buy from them. They will insist you to buy annual maintenance contract worth of 3300 (which will cover the UF filter cost , but pump cost is separate). Their warranty is useless and will not cover anything. Honestly speaking, I won't gonna buy any aquaguard product in future. Rs 3300 AMC for a 11000 product is absurd.

comments.title: Good water purifier for non borewell water supply
comments.description: We purchased it as a replacement to our HUL Pure-it Classic. We have a corporation water supply with TDS around 200-250. This purifier works really well for that TDS water level and retains the water taste. The water is clear, without any smell or particles and TDS is retained as-is. I have confirmed it with a TDS meter. Overall if you are looking for a purifies which doesn't waste water and your TDS values are in acceptable range, then this is a good choice.

comments.title: Worst Customer Service Experience...!!! Still purifier issue is not resolved.
comments.description: Pathetic service. I have purchased this purifier at the end of December 2021 and within 3 months purifier stopped working and a white light is constantly blinking on the indicator panel for which the product manual says filters inside the purifier has reached its end of life. Then I registered a complaint regarding the same. Technician visited and says that filters need to be changed. As per the product manual, filters should be having life of 6000L, then how come the filters of the purifier are indicating the end of life within 3 months. The technicians said that they would forward this issue to the company and would try to claim the filters but still the issue has not been resolved nor I have received any sort of response. I am feeling helpless in this summer time.

comments.title: Do not buy aquaguard online
comments.description: It is 4 months since I have installed this aquaguard and i could use this only for 2 weeks in this 4 months time. Remaining time it was down for service for various reasons. By now I have replaced all filters except RO membrane, adapter and the water control valve. The issue is still not resolved and the service is really poor. Technicians are clueless as to why the TDS value of water from RO unit is higher than the TDS of input water and why the water smell and taste is bad after so many repairs and replacements. They say since this is online purchase, they cannot do anything further. I would recommend not to buy this product online after seeing the lack of service quality especially towards online purchases.

comments.title: Worst water purifier
comments.description: I purchased 10 months ago. From 2nd months onwards this unit giving impure water. Service engineers visited almost every other month, changed the filter but with in 2 weeks of service I start getting impure water and dust inside transparent water chamber. As per their request, I even installed external filter by paying Kent 2000 rs, but that also did not solve the problem. So if you don't want to waste money then stop thinking about this product. I asked Kent to refund money as this is totally a flop product but it seems they don't have any refund and replacement policy. Moreover you can't even buy Annual Maintenance plan from Kent, which means you need to pay from your pocket heavily after one year of warranty. So pls find other product, Kent Maxx is totally unfit to serve the purpose.

Aquaguard says all filters and motor need to be replaced - costing us 9000! Irony is that a new one is available in the same model for 88000.

So do ensure you add this to your costing.

comments.title: Great Deal From Amazon and Prompt Service From Livpure
comments.design: Style Name: Bolt DX RO+ Pure UV+Smart TDS Adjuster
comments.description: Everything was smooth and quick. Impressed by Livpure's promptness. Installation was done in a day. Service expert contacted even before the product was delivered. Worried about the leakage issue as mentioned in few reviews. Thankfully nothing negative happened. Water quality after 2 tank washed process improved. The flavour is exactly like packaged drinking water we buy from market. Tank doesn't take much time to fill. It is sufficient for a falmily of 4 to 5. Will review again after few days of usage.Thanks Amazon for a great deal and Livpure for a great product.

comments.title: Really good product with little bit quality control issue
comments.design: Style Name: Bolt DX RO+ Pure UV+Smart TDS Adjuster
comments.description: I'm using it for last 10 days, It's a really good product. The installation process is nice I would say. The technician told me he will come at 3pm but actually came at 5pm. After installation he left but after 15-20 min the purifier started leaking. I called the technician but he told me we will come the next day. Meanwhile I also noticed that the water opening tap is not symmetrical it's rotated slightly left. I told the technician to fix that he tried but unable to do it. So I'm stuck with it. It's working alright but wierd to look at.

comments.title: Best product for us
comments.description: We stay in rural area where we have borewell which supplies ground water, the water has different taste which is why we used to get mineral water of 20 litres from ATM machine installed in our area. It was getting tough so we wanted to try Purifier which will help purify our borewell water to mineral water. We already had Eureka but it just filtered the water, the taste did not change. We tried to save money initially as we were told the maintenance cost for Kent is high, but the other brand purifier did not help it was told RO but it dint change the taste. So we thought of giving kent a try and it was our best decision. The technician came installed explained and set tds to proper level to help us get good taste water and we are happy. It throws out waste water but we use it to wash urensils. They have free servicing for few years which is not bad. The cheaper purifiers might be less but their life is also small. I have been using this for months and it has been very helpful. If you really want change in taste of water this is good option for sure.

comments.title: Use of Kent pre-filter
comments.description: I purchased Kent RO 11111 product to reduce the total dissolved solids (TDS) value of my tap water. As per others, the person who came for the installation of this product also recommends installing a Kent pre-filter (cost 1500 INR) to reduce the TDS value of tap water. I returned that person and rescheduled my installation. I told that person firstly I shall take confirmation from KENT technical team then after I shall install my RO with Kent pre-filter. So I contacted to Kent technical team and informed the whole matter. The Kent technical team accepted their mistake and apologized for this recommendation from that person. They told me clearly that the pre-filter is not capable to decrease the TDS value it is recommended only for cleaning the water if your water has mud, dust particles, sand, etc. So, I told to everyone if their tap water has any mud, dust particles, sand, etc. then they will install the pre-filter remaining these there is no use of the pre-filter.

comments.title: Pathetic experience
comments.description: A horrible and pathetic experience with eureka forbes. First or installation being done after 4 days of delivery. Then issues related to water leakage and black particles was observed. They have registered a complaint since last 7 days but not bothered to attend and visit for the same. Everytime a call is made at call center they acknowledge that complaint is locked since 5’April but by when it’ll be resolved they don’t have the answer. If they are having service of this kind in metro cities, then it’s hard to think how will this company work in other places. Amazon shouldn’t promote and sell such company products who aren’t service oriented.

comments.title: Pathetic experience
comments.description: A horrible and pathetic experience with eureka forbes. First or installation being done after 4 days of delivery. Everytime a call is made at call center they acknowledge that complaint is locked since 5’April but by when it’ll be resolved they don’t have the answer. If they are having service of this kind in metro cities, then it’s hard to think how will this company work in other places. Amazon shouldn’t promote and sell such company products who aren’t service oriented.

Amazon shouldn’t promote and sell such company products who aren’t service oriented.

It took 15 calls to get a technician to visit and repair only for the problem to recur within 1 week. Again takes more than 15 calls and more than 2 weeks to get a technician to attend. comments.title: Lot of recurring costs.
comments.description: The product itself is good enough for 200 TDS or below water. Though company claims 6000 litre of purification before the UF filter will stop working, but in reality it is way less. UF filter gave up in 8 months, we are family of 3 only so it should last around a year. Now cost of replacing the UF filter is around 700 (as informed by the authorised service person). They will insist on installing a booster pump as well which will cost you around 4200 if you buy from them. They will insist you to buy annual maintenance contract worth of 3300 (which will cover the UF filter cost , but pump cost is separate). Their warranty is useless and will not cover anything. Honestly speaking, I won't gonna buy any aquaguard product in future. Rs 3300 AMC for a 11000 product is absurd.

comments.title: Good water purifier for non borewell water supply

This purifier works really well for that TDS water level and retains the water taste. The water is clear, without any smell or particles and TDS is retained as-is. I have confirmed it with a TDS meter. Overall if you are looking for a purifies which doesn't waste water and your TDS values are in acceptable range, then this is a good choice.

comments.title: Faulty Purifier - Don't Buy
comments.description: I bought it during the sales. The installation guy would convience you to spend extra money for seperate filter. Even when you insist they will not test the water TDS level and would ask you to book a service only for that. When I did that we found that the TDS level is same in the outlet & inlet. The purifier is not filtering at all. When raising the complaint again, one of the candles has been replaced by the technician, the service took 3 days as the technician couldn't find the problem initially. After two days, the purifier stopped again as the water is not filling up in the tank. This is worst experience & I suggest not to buy this product on Amazon as Eureka Forbes make it exclusively for Amazon which is inferior quality compared to regular ones. On the other hand I have an old model bought directly with Eureka Forbes and it's running good from last 12 years.

Thrice in last one month, a Eureka Forbes Technician has checked this Purifier but he has not been able to point out the problem and fix it. My Purifier stopped working three days ago and I made instant complaint but its been more than 72 hours but No one from Eureka Forbes has visited my place. They are just calling me that my issue will be taken on priority basis but clearly they are neglecting it. I am forced to think of buying some other company's Purifier because Eureka Forbes customer service is pathetic and I am fed up with it.  This was not expected from such a big brand.

comments.title: Very high maintenance cost of about 50% cost every two years.
comments.description: Very high maintenance cost.  Will quickly require change of filter membrane based on water quality and consumption.  About 50% of initial cost for every two years. Very poor value for money. Automatically shuts down, if you don't change candle for every 6 months or fixed quantity. You have no choice except to call for technician.  No water without change of candle Rs 700/ every 6 months and filters Rs.3000/ every one year.  Every 2 years filters change cost of Rs.4500/- It may be even earlier if you consume more water.  I feel it is a small white elephant in kitchen.

comments.title: Varying input TDS water cant give WHO recomended output TDS - This machine is NOT Dynamic
comments.description: TDS output will be 10% of input, if input is 300 TDS the output will be 30 TDS and not recomended for drinking purpose. The machine cannt handle for varying TDS inout from bore water, normally in appartments if the bore well water is not sufficient enough during summer, the water will be purchased from outside and this results in TDS variation, in short this machine cannt give recomened TDS output for varying input TDS. After long followup they have refunded my money. Also many spare parts keep failing in just 2 month and it is replaced since it was in warranty, once it will get over 1 year the spare parts are costly.

comments.title: DO NOT BUY - SAFETY, HEALTH RISK - Worst quality - Repaired in a month, costs 2000 Rs per month
comments.description: I bought this from Amazon. Within a month, the unit got overheat and released dirty, hot water without any indication. I reached customer care and they changed the filter. The same issue is repeating for the past 4 months. I escalated this issue with the head of india. But no proper resolution yet. Every month, the service rep charging me around 2000 Rs as main filter change. But there is no indication in the machine. We need to identify that the machine is repaired by the hot water or taste of the water. This is really frustrating. I wonder why Amazon promotes and sells such low quality products. Do not ever buy pureit products as this is my second water purifier. First one is gone within a year. Now this.

comments.title: Good product and easy to install. Water Taste is also good.
Simple and very useful
comments.description: I have been using this purifier (please note that it's a purifier and not an RO) for two weeks now. It was very easy to install. The Kent installation guy was trying to sell another filter for 600 bucks but I strongly declined as it is almost useless. Kent needs to work a lot on that. If I am buying a filter already why would I buy another one and if it's necessary why they didn't include it in the package. Coming to the filter, it is only Ultraviolet and Ultra filtration system which is suitable for Municipal supplied water which is my case. The water comes out very pure and I enjoy drinking it. The product is worth the price which is around 6 to 6.5k. Go for it if it suits you.
